Text.Value: Gateway PROFINET IO-Device to 16-Port Two-Track IO-Link Wireless Master (Expert)
Supports FastStartup, Identification & Maintenance 1-3 and 5 (IOLD submodules), Shared Device, RT and IRT Communication down to 1ms Sendclock, Advanced startup.
PROFINET IO-Device to 8-Port One-Track IO-Link Wireless Master gateway (Expert). Minimum Device Interval is 1ms and supports Netload Class III.
IO-Link Wireless Master with configuration. All master settings are transfered by the PLC
IO-Link Wireless Master with configuration. All master settings are transfered by the PLC
